Nodes.Text: Greetings, traveler. The roads have been dangerous lately. What brings you out here?

Choices.Text: What dangers are you talking about?

Nodes.Text: Well, be careful. The snapjaws have been bolder than usual. Stick to the open paths if you can.
Snapjaws, mostly. They come out of the caves at night and raid our supplies. Some folk have gone missing too.
Ah, a visitor! I'm always tinkering with something. Need anything repaired, or just browsing?

Choices.Text: Know anything useful about the area?

Nodes.Text: I salvage old tech and put it to new use. You'd be surprised what you can find in the ruins if you know where to look.

Choices.Text: Interesting. I'll keep that in mind.

Nodes.Text: The ruins to the east have the best salvage, but they're crawling with snapjaw hunters. The caves are safer, but the pickings are slim.
Welcome, welcome! I've got wares from all across the land. Take a look -- you won't find better prices anywhere.

Choices.Text: Where do you get your goods?

Nodes.Text: Here and there. Caravans from the north, salvage from the ruins, the occasional adventurer who needs coin more than steel. Business is business.
Always carry a healing tonic. And never fight a snapjaw hunter without good armor. Beyond that? Buy low, sell high.
